annotations.description: If you consistently put the needs of others above your own and lead by self-sacrifice, you might be showing signs of codependency. Here are other signs.
annotations.title: Are You Codependent? Here Are the Key Signs of Codependency

textContent:
Why are we such good friends but struggling so much being married?

Uncertain: staying is realizing the commitment to each other (but perpetuates co-dependency). Leaving creates space to heal (but adds complexity)

Is it more painful to stay? Or more painful to leave? Is it healthier long term to stay or to leave? 

What patterns of dependency are maintained by staying? How can you break them when you stay? 

If we take space apart, why would we drift apart? And if we do what does that say? 

A - Assert power over -> need help push back
G - Withdraw power in -> need help asserting

Healthy dependence also means you:

state your own needs and desires
ask for support when you find yourself struggling
feel safe and comfortable expressing your own needs
let others know when they’re asking too much of you without worrying they’ll reject you

https://psychcentral.com/lib/symptoms-signs-of-codependency#dependent-on-others-or-codependent
title: Reflections
textContentHtml:
Why are we such good friends but struggling so much being married?


Uncertain: staying is realizing the commitment to each other (but perpetuates co-dependency). Leaving creates space to heal (but adds complexity)


Is it more painful to stay? Or more painful to leave? Is it healthier long term to stay or to leave? 


What patterns of dependency are maintained by staying? How can you break them when you stay? 


If we take space apart, why would we drift apart? And if we do what does that say? 


A - Assert power over -> need help push back

G - Withdraw power in -> need help asserting


Healthy dependence also means you:


state your own needs and desires

ask for support when you find yourself struggling

feel safe and comfortable expressing your own needs

let others know when they’re asking too much of you without worrying they’ll reject you
